subject: Chemistry
instructions: Attempt all questions from this section

questions.question: The quantum number that specifies the orientation of an orbital in space is:
According to Hund's rule, electrons in degenerate orbitals:
options: Occupy orbitals singly with parallel spins before pairing
Have opposite spins in the same orbital
Fill from higher to lower energy
questions.answer: Occupy orbitals singly with parallel spins before pairing

questions.question: The element with the highest first ionization energy in the periodic table is:
In the Aufbau principle, the order of filling orbitals is:
The electron affinity trend down a group in the periodic table is:
Which quantum mechanical model best explains the stability of atoms with half-filled or fully filled subshells?
options: Exchange energy and symmetry in molecular orbital theory
questions.answer: Exchange energy and symmetry in molecular orbital theory

options: Ideal gas assumptions of point masses and no interactions
Volume of molecules and intermolecular forces
questions.answer: Volume of molecules and intermolecular forces

questions.question: Raoult's law applies to:
options: Ideal solutions where vapor pressure is proportional to mole fraction
questions.answer: Ideal solutions where vapor pressure is proportional to mole fraction
